game.name: Checkpoint Run
game.description:
Get ready to test your ultimate driving skills on a professional looking racing track! This city is known for conducting the continuous races. The person who drives fast on the road can win this race competition. The driver of the car has spotted you and got you convinced to help him become a car race champion. Are you ready to take up this challenge? Join Checkpoint Run game right away and make it impossible for other drivers to win this race! Grab this chance to become the best rider!

The task is pretty simple. You as a driver of a wonderful car have to drive this car through the highlighted parts of the map and reach to the destination. Keep your eyes on the arrow points to make sure that you are on the right path in this brand new racing game! Do not forget to overtake your rivals and progress to the advanced level! Begin it with the selection of the difficult level you want to explore at first! Start with an easy mode and then jump on the hard level!

Your objective in this free online car game is to reach the check point at the other side. You can play this cute HTML5 car game through arrow keys. Use P to pause and also collect other useful keys to drive your car at top speed while avoiding the hamburgers! There is no shortage for the obstacles right from the challenging tracks in the hills to the tight turns of the city center. Keep focused and find your way towards the victory in this arcade fun challenge!??
